title: Aadhaar Mask Detector
description: A full-stack machine learning web application that detects and masks Aadhaar numbers from uploaded images to improve document privacy. Built with a focus on reliable APIs, CORS handling, and strict error management.
problemStatement: In today's digital world, sharing sensitive documents like Aadhaar cards often exposes individuals to identity theft. Managing and securely redacting these 12-digit numbers manually is prone to human error and heavily time-consuming.
solution: We developed an automated machine learning pipeline that uses YOLOv8 for precise document detection and Tesseract OCR to read text. Once the specific Aadhaar digits are identified, the system programmatically masks them, returning a secured image to the user in seconds.
features: Responsive, modern frontend built with React

title: Chatty Messenger
description: A real-time messaging application engineered with the MERN stack and Socket.IO. Delivers instant notifications, secure private chats through Firebase, and a polished Tailwind CSS interface.
problemStatement: Building a messaging app requires handling complex state management and instantaneous bi-directional communication, which traditional REST APIs struggle to consistently deliver with low latency.
solution: Implemented WebSockets via Socket.IO for a persistent connection between the client and server. This allows for real-time delivery of messages, typing indicators, and online status without the need for constant polling.
features: Instant typing indicators and read receipts
Optimized MongoDB data modeling for chat histories
Dark and light mode UI options

title: AI Verse Platform
description: A multi-tool AI platform integrating OpenAI APIs to deliver intelligent chatbot interactions, text summarization, and real-time code explanations. Built with advanced state management and fluid theme transitions.
problemStatement: Users often have to switch between multiple specialized AI tools to get basic work done, breaking workflows and reducing overall productivity.
solution: Created a centralized hub that communicates with various OpenAI models depending on the task context. It features a unified, highly polished interface that seamlessly shifts between code explanation, drafting, and conversational AI modes.
features: Integration with OpenAI GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 APIs
State-of-the-art UI with framer motion animations
Robust state management via Redux Toolkit

title: Eco-Drive Platform
description: A comprehensive full-stack platform promoting eco-friendly vehicles. Features seamless user authentication, dynamic vehicle listings, and a highly responsive interface designed for optimal user engagement.
problemStatement: There is a lack of consolidated, modern platforms focused exclusively on educating consumers and connecting them with eco-friendly mobility solutions like EVs and hybrids.
solution: Built an interactive e-commerce style platform where users can browse detailed vehicle specifications, compare environmental impacts, and engage with community reviews in a clean, high-performance web environment.
features: Secure user accounts and review systems
Responsive design optimized for all screen sizes

title: Summer Paleson Portfolio
description: A premium personal branding portfolio template featuring clean UI, elegant typography, and a fully responsive modern layout. Strongly focused on UI/UX principles and professional aesthetic branding.
problemStatement: Developers and designers need a quick, highly customizable way to present their work online without sacrificing premium design aesthetics.
solution: Designed a meticulously crafted frontend template utilizing modern CSS techniques, fluid typography, and strategic whitespace to ensure content always remains the primary focus.
features: Custom CSS grid and flexbox layouts

title: World Galaxy
description: A visually stunning photo gallery featuring smooth scroll animations and real-time image data fetching through external APIs.
problemStatement: Standard image galleries often feel static and lifeless, failing to properly highlight high-quality algorithmic or generative art.
solution: Integrated Framer Motion for scroll-linked animations and page transitions, ensuring the user experience feels highly interactive and premium while browsing large datasets of images via Unsplash API.
features: Dynamic grid layouts that adapt to image orientation
Heavy optimization for image loading and caching

title: Drive with Raj
description: A luxury car e-commerce platform incorporating Firebase Authentication, Firestore, and cloud storage. Engineered for live data synchronization and a modern, high-performance user interface.
problemStatement: High-end vehicle sales require a digital showroom that feels as premium as the products themselves, demanding fast load times and exceptional visual fidelity.
solution: Leveraged React combined with Firebase to create a real-time, highly responsive digital showroom. Images are served securely and quickly, and user data is synced instantly across sessions.
features: Secure authentication loops with Firebase Auth

title: QR Code Generator
description: A high-performance utility that converts text and URLs into downloadable QR codes. Features a minimalist UI and instant generation logic.
problemStatement: Many online QR code generators are bloated with ads or require server-side rendering, which slows down the process and raises privacy concerns.
solution: Built a purely client-side React application that generates QR codes instantly in the browser using canvas manipulation, allowing for immediate downloads and absolute data privacy.
features: Customizable colors and error correction levels
